Hit the mouth of the river. You will see many others doing the same. As for the bay it,s self,you need to know the area. Look for weed edges on drops.. Crank baits and senkos work best.

Those largies are decent but Simcoe is famous for its tank smallies. 4-5 lb not uncommon. They run in schools around sholes and islands at the top of Cooks Bay and elsewhereÂ Â on Simcoe. Find one you usually find more. Google it. Thereâ€™s lots of info out there.
